      • handleWindowShownEvent

        void handleWindowShownEvent()
        See Also:
        method called before Main windom will be shown must be used instead of Constructor and initialize because here we can use FXML objects which now are initialized responding for reading config file initializing Client object with data from readed file loading login view loading center view fill by default center bar with Classifieds
